title: Zodiac Wander
concept: Zodiac Wander ‚Äî where stars meet your story. Discover your zodiac sign, connect with your birth flower, explore traits, and share thoughts with others on a cosmic journey.

info.title: Challenges.
info.content: Data Structure Complexity: Zodiac content (sign traits, horoscopes, dates, compatibility, icons, comments) required a well-organized but extensible data format. A complicated .json file structure posed readability, maintenance, and scalability issues.

info.title: Solution & Implementations.
info.content: Structured JSON Design: Created a normalized JSON structure separating static zodiac info (signs, traits, icons) from dynamic content (comments). Ensured each zodiac entry contained consistent keys and nested data in a readable format. Example keys: zodiac, date_range, element, traits, compatibility, horoscopes, comments.

info.title: Results & Impacts.
info.content: Scalable Structure: The clean JSON structure simplified data access and made future backend migration easier.

info.title: üöÄ Future Improvements
info.content: Migrate dynamic content like comments and horoscopes to a backend (e.g., Firebase, Supabase). Support multiple languages and real-time compatibility quizzes.
